name: @eluvio/elv-js-helpers
description: A collection of Javascript helper functions used by several Eluvio libraries.

scripts.build: echo 'Deleting and recreating ./build directory...' && npm run build-main-js && rimraf build && ./bin/publish.sh && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:analyze: echo 'Building single-file bundles in ./build/dist... (with bundle size analysis)' && export WEBPACK_ENV='--env analyze' && npm run build
scripts.build:dist: echo 'Building single-file bundles in ./build/dist...' && webpack $WEBPACK_ENV && uglifyjs build/dist/elv-js-helpers.js -m -o build/dist/elv-js-helpers.min.js
scripts.generate-docs-debug: echo 'Regenerating documentation in ./docs (with debug output)...' && export ELV_RAMDOC_DEBUG=1;jsdoc --readme README.md --configure .jsdoc.json
scripts.release: echo 'Incrementing version and publishing to npmjs.com...' && cp package.json ./build/package.json && np
scripts.test: echo 'Running all tests in ./test...' && npm run build-main-js && mocha --recursive "./test/**/*.test.js"
scripts.test-coverage: echo 'Running all tests in ./test... (with test coverage report)' && npm run build-main-js && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --recursive "./test/**/*.test.js" && echo 'open ./coverage/index.html for coverage details'
scripts.update-dependencies: echo 'Updating dependencies in package.json and installing any new version(s)...' && npx npm-check-updates -u && npm install
scripts.version: echo 'Executing npm publish hook: version... (rebuilds docs with new version number and rebuilds ./build/dist)' && npm run generate-docs && npm run build && git add docs || git commit -m 'Update docs' || true

author: Eluvio, Inc.
